Package it.unipd.dei.se

Class HelloIR

java.lang.Object
it.unipd.dei.se.HelloTipster
public class HelloIR
extends Object
Introductory example on how to use Apache Lucene to index and search for toy documents.
Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Nicola Ferro (ferro@dei.unipd.it)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    HelloIR()
    Creates a new instance using the default path for the index directory and the default file for the run.
    HelloIR​(String indexPath, String runFile)
    Creates a new instance for the specified index directory and run file.

  • Constructor Details

    • HelloIR

      public HelloIR​(String indexPath, String runFile) throws IOException
      Creates a new instance for the specified index directory and run file.
      Parameters:
      indexPath - the path where to store the index.
      runFile - the file where to write the run.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong accessing the index directory or the run file.

    • HelloIR

      public HelloIR() throws IOException
      Creates a new instance using the default path for the index directory and the default file for the run.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong accessing the index directory or the run file.

  • Method Details

    • parseDocuments

      public List<Document> parseDocuments()
      Parses the toy documents and returns a list of Documents.
      Returns:
      the list of documents.

    • index

      public void index​(List<Document> docs, Analyzer analyzer) throws IOException
      Indexes the provided Documents with the given Analyzer.
      Parameters:
      docs - the documents to be indexed.
      analyzer - the analyzer to be used.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while indexing.

    • search

      public void search​(String queryID, String query, Analyzer analyzer) throws IOException
      Searches for the provided query, by processing it with the given Analyzer.
      Parameters:
      queryID - the identifier of the query.
      query - the query to search for.
      analyzer - the analyzer to be used.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while searching.

    • close

      public void close()
      Closes and releases resources.

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws IOException
      Main method of the class.
      Parameters:
      args - command line arguments. If provided, args[0] contains the path the the index directory; args[1] contains the path to the run file.
      Throws:
      IOException - if something goes wrong while indexing and searching.
